author: Jamie Lovett
title: Star Trek: Discovery Casts Harry Potter Alum As Ship's Captain
text:
Star Trek: Discovery Casts Harry Potter Alum As Ship's Captain Jamie Lovett — Jason Isaacs (@jasonsfolly) March 7, 2017 
Harry Potter film alum Jason Isaacs has been cast in as Captain Lorca of the Starship Discovery in Star Trek: Discovery . Isaacs played Lucius Malfoy in the Harry Potter film franchise. More recently he played the villain of Netflix’s The OA . 
In a break with Star Trek tradition, Captain Lorca will note be the show’s lead protagonist. Instead, the show will focus on a lieutenant played by Sonequa Martin-Green ( The Walking Dead ). 
The cast of Star Trek: Discovery will also include Michelle Yeoh as Captain Georgiou, the captain of another Starfleet ship, the Shenzhou, that is important to the plot of Star Trek : Discovery . 
Other cast members include James Frain ( Gotham ) as Sarek, Spock’s father, Dough Jones ( Hellboy ) as science officer Lt. Saru who is a member of an alien race being introduced in Star Trek: Discovery , and Anthony Rapp as Lt. Stamets, another Starfleet science officer. Up Next: Star Trek: Discovery Gets New Release Window 
Star Trek: Discovery was originally slated for a May debut, but a production delay has pushed the release window back to early fall. When it does premiere, the first episode Star Trek: Discovery will air on CBS. The remainder of the 13-episode first season will debut on CBS's streaming subscription service CBS All Access. 
Star Trek: Discovery was created by Bryan Fuller and Alex Kurtzman. Fuller was originally intended to be Discovery 's showrunner but was forced step down due to commitments to Starz ' adaptation of Neil Gaiman's American Gods series. Gretchen J. Berg and Aaron Harberts have taken over as showrunners.
